perfcenter.analytical

Class SolverMultiClosedMVA

  • java.lang.Object
    • perfcenter.analytical.SolverMulti
      • perfcenter.analytical.SolverMultiClosedMVA

  • public class SolverMultiClosedMVA
extends SolverMulti
    Solves a multiclass closed model, using MVA algorithm.
    Author:
    Federico Granata, Stefano Omini

      • SolverMultiClosedMVA

        public SolverMultiClosedMVA(int classes,
                    int stations)
        Creates new SolverMultiClosedMVA
        Parameters:
        stations - number of service centers
        classes - number of classes of customers

    • Method Detail

      • input

        public boolean input(java.lang.String[] n,
            int[] t,
            double[][][] s,
            double[][] v,
            int[] pop,
            int[] noserv)
        initializes the Multi class solver with the system parameters.
        Parameters:
        n - array of names of the service centers.
        t - array of types (LD or LI) of the service centers.
        s - matrix of service time of the service centers.
        v - matrix of visits to the service centers.
        pop - array of populations of each class
        Returns:
        true if the operation is completed with success

      • hasSufficientProcessingCapacity

        public boolean hasSufficientProcessingCapacity()
        A system is said to have sufficient capacity to process a given load lambda if no service center is saturated as a result of the combined loads of all the classes.
        Must be implemented to create a multi class model solver.
        WARNING: This method should be called before solving the system.
        Specified by:
        hasSufficientProcessingCapacity in class SolverMulti
        Returns:
        true if sufficient capacity exists for the given workload, false otherwise

      • solve

        public void solve()
        Solves the model, using an appropriate technique (LI or LD model).
        "input(...)" method must have been called before solving the model!!

        Specified by:
        solve in class SolverMulti

      • solve

        public void solve(boolean intermediate)
        Solves the model, using an appropriate technique (LI or LD model).
        To solve a closed model with N customers, all the models with 0, 1, 2, ... N-1 customers must be solved before. This method allows to save the results for these intermediate models.
        Parameters:
        intermediate - true to save intermediate results

      • solveLI

        private void solveLI()
        Solves a model with only load independent stations

        private void solveLI(boolean intermediate)
